item.title: Suspected homemade bombs found at Hamilton mall, roads blocked off
item.description:
A number of suspected homemade bombs have been found at a Hamilton mall this morning, police said.
Roads around Chartwell shopping centre have been cordoned off as a result of the incident.

item.title: 'Her kids watched her die': Young mum's undiagnosed condition
item.description:
A West Auckland mum who died suddenly at home with her newborn and seventh child, just three days after giving birth, had an undiagnosed postpartum infection.
Emerald Tai and her baby son Tanatui both ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: Exclusive poll: Most Kiwis want borders to remain shut
item.description:
Most Kiwis want New Zealand's borders to stay shut to non-residents, despite high-powered calls to soften restrictions to ease economic pain.
That's according to the NZ Herald-Kantar Vote 2020 poll ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz
